setting.location: Elegant ballroom in grand Warsaw hotel, Congress Poland, converted for aristocratic charity bazaar with crystal chandeliers

characters.appearance: Man in early 40s with dark hair, powerful build, intense gaze
characters.clothing: Expensive but conservative black business suit, gold watch chain
characters.position: Standing near charity booth, holding purchased item
characters.action: Gazing intently across the room with mixture of longing and determination

characters.appearance: Young woman in early 20s, blonde hair, ethereal beauty, cool expression
characters.clothing: Elegant day dress of rose silk with bustle, matching parasol, small fashionable hat
characters.position: Behind charity booth with other aristocratic ladies
characters.action: Arranging items for sale while deliberately avoiding eye contact

characters.appearance: Group of aristocratic ladies in their 30s-40s
characters.clothing: Fashionable day dresses in various pastels, elaborate hats with feathers
characters.position: Surrounding the young woman at charity booth
characters.action: Whispering behind fans while glancing at the merchant

scene.mainElements: Grand ballroom with multiple charity booths staffed by aristocratic ladies, merchant standing apart as obvious outsider despite his wealth, palpable social tension
scene.details: Crystal chandeliers, tall windows with brocade curtains, charity booths decorated with ribbons and flowers, tables displaying handmade items and crafts, servants circulating with refreshment trays, potted palms in corners, parquet floor reflecting light, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Other charity booths with society ladies and patrons, orchestra platform empty but music stands visible, doorways leading to hotel corridors
scene.atmosphere: Superficial charity mixed with deep social divisions, unspoken attraction battling rigid class boundaries

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot encompassing both the merchant and aristocratic booth
composition.focus: The charged space between the merchant and young aristocrat
composition.depth: Merchant in foreground left, charity booth with ladies in middle right, ballroom extending into background

lineArt.weight: very fine, built up in layers
